page.title: 10IMPRESSIONS OF SHELTON
page.content: My name is Angela Smith.I am ten years old and live in Shelton.I attend Cauldon Primary School which was built in the last century about l897.It is a mixture of old and new buildings but has no green playing fields.It could be better!There is Hanley Park nearby though,which has swings and a lake. My house is between the two shopping centres of Hanley and Stoke,so we do not have to walk a long way to go shopping.Shelton is quite pleasant but it could be improved.They could let bicycles in and keep motor vehicles out. During our local industrial holiday which we call the"Potters Fortnight" the place is very dull and quiet with not much to do apart from playing sports.
